text: This is a list of people on stamps of Finland and Åland, including the dates of issue of the stamps honoring them. (continue with 1986) , Åland == A == * Ida Aalberg (1957) * Alvar Aalto (1976) * Aino Ackté (1976) * Mikael Agricola (1948) * Juhani Aho (1961) * Tommi Ahvala (1995) * Santeri Alkio (1962) == C == * Minna Canth (1944) * Matthias Castrén (1963) * Uno Cygnaeus (1960) == E == * J.A. Ehrenström (1950) * Carl Ludvig Engel (1950) == G == * Johan Gadolin (1960) * Akseli Gallen-Kallela (1965) * Hannes Gebhard (1949) == H == * Pekka Halonen (1965) * Tarja Halonen (2003) * Bishop Henry (1955) * Mika Häkkinen (1999) == J == * Arvid Järnefelt (1961) * Armas Järnefelt (1969) * Maria Jotuni (1980) == K == * Kyösti Kallio (1941, 1973) * Urho Kekkonen (1960, 1970, 1980) * Ilmari Kianto (1974) * Aleksis Kivi (1931, 1984) * Heikki Klemetti (1976) * Mauno Koivisto (1983) * Toivo Kuula (1983) == L == * Johannes Linnankoski (1969) * Eino Leino (1978) * Jari Litmanen (1994) * Elias Lönnrot (1931) * Martin Luther (1967) == M == * Leevi Madetoja (1987) * Georg Malmstén (1999) * Carl Gustaf Emil Mannerheim (1937, 1941, 1952, 1967) * Oskar Merikanto (1968) * Tommi Mäkinen (2000) *Maria Alexandrovna (Marie of Hesse), Empress consort of Alexander II of Russia (2011) == N == * J.J. Nervander (1955) * Hj. Nortamo (1960) * Paavo Nurmi (1973) == P == * Juho Kusti Paasikivi (1947, 1950, 1970) * Larin Paraske (1985) == R == * Lauri Kristian Relander (1983) * Paavo Ruotsalainen (1977) * Risto Ryti (1941) == S == * Eliel Saarinen (1973) * Pedri Semeikka (1985) * Emil Nestor Setälä (1964) * Jean Sibelius (1945, 1957, 1965) * Frans Eemil Sillanpää (1980) * Johan Vilhelm Snellman (1956) * Kaarlo Juho Ståhlberg (1945, 1965) * Pehr Evind Svinhufvud (1931, 1944) == T == * Zacharias Topelius (1968) == V == * Artturi Ilmari Virtanen (1980) == W == * Ivar Wilskman (1954) == Y == * Arvo Ylppö (1987) == Åland == The list is complete up to the year 2004. *Olaf II of Norway (1984) *Catherine of Sweden (1990) *Frans Peter Von Knorring (1992) *Joel Pettersson (1992) *Sally Salminen (1996) *Fanny Sundström (1996) *Hlodver Lange (2000) *Hilda Hongell (2000) *Janne Holmén (2002) *Mark Levengood (2003) *Mauno Koivisto (2004) Finland, List of people on stamps of People on stamps Category:Philately of Finland Stamps
title: List of people on the postage stamps of Finland
